title: Where to find suite logs
content:
This section provides information about where to find the suite logs for troubleshooting or administration purposes based on your actual scenarios. In the tables below,

  • <itom-vol-claim> refers to the OPTIC Management Toolkit (OMT) core NFS volume (for example: /var/vols/itom/itsma/core)
  • <global-volume> refers to the SMA suite's global NFS volume (for example: /var/vols/itom/itsma/global-volume)
  • <smartanalytics-volume> refers to the SMA suite's Smart Analytics NFS volume (for example: /var/vols/itom/itsma/smartanalytics-volume)
  • <base-directory> refers to the parent folder of the SMA suite's global NFS volume (for example: /var/vols/itom/itsma)

Installation and upgrade

Scenario Log file location
Fail to install the suite
  • <itom-vol-claim>/suite-install/itsma/output/deployer.log
  • <itom-vol-claim>/suite-install/itsma/output/status.log
  • <itom-vol-claim>/suite-install/logs/cdf-apiserver.*.log
  • Log files under folder <global-volume>/logs/services/<yyyy.mm>/<service-name>/deploy-controller
The upgrade precheck fails
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-content-validation pod>/maas/maas_upg_framework.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-content-validation pod>/maas/maas_upg_step_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-content-validation-pod>/maas/maas_upg_verification.log
Fail to upgrade the suite
  • <global-volume>/logs/update/deployer.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/update/status.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/upgradetenant/<itom-xruntime-upgrade-tenants pod>/upgradeTenant.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/lcm/<itom-xruntime-lcm-upgrade-pod>/lifecycle.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_upg_framework.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_upg_step_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_upg_verification.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_tenantManagent.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/dnd-upgrade-job/dnd-upgrade.log

Integration

Scenario Log file location
OPB-based UCMDB integration

Offline platform pod only:

  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/${platform-pod}/maas/maas_ucmdb_sync.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/${platform-pod}/maas/maas_opb.log
OO integration

Online platform pod only:

  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/${platform-pod}/maas/maas_oo-integration.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/${platform-pod}/maas/maas_opb.log

Authentication and license issues in a tenant

Scenario Log file location
'INVALID TOKEN' or 'OH NO! SOMETHING WENT WRONG...' error occurs during login
  • <global-volume>/logs/idm/<idm-pod>/idm-service.log
'User xxx not passed in sync' error occurs
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/gateway/<itom-xruntime-gateway-pod>/localhost_access_log*.txt
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/gateway/<itom-xruntime-gateway-pod>/maas/gateway_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/localhost_access_log*.txt
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_ums.log
An unexpected 'session timeout' error occurs when a session is active or immediately after login
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/gateway/<itom-xruntime-gateway-pod>/localhost_access_log*.txt
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/gateway/<itom-xruntime-gateway-pod>/maas/gateway_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/gateway/<itom-xruntime-gateway-pod>/maas/gateway_info.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/idm/<idm-pod>/idm-service.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/bo/<itom-bo-login-deployment-pod>.log
Unexpected 'no free license slot' error or 'no license found' error occurs
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_lms.log

Cloud Management license issue in communication with Autopass while applying a license
  • <global-volume>/logs/bo/<itom-bo-license-deployment-pod>.log

Cloud Management license issue in communication with Autopass or insufficient license during subscription
  • <global-volume>/logs/dnd/<namespace>/<namespace>__<podName>__itom-dnd-controller__<workerName>/csa/csa.log

Certificate

Scenario Log file location
Certificate issues. For example, a function that requires a customized certificate is not working; or you're seeing certificate-related error messages.
  • <global-volume>/logs/certificate/<itom-itsma-certificate-deployment-pod>.log

Ingress Service

Scenario Log file location
Fail to access the suite or a server error is displayed
  • <global-volume>/logs/ingress/frontend/access.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/ingress/frontend/error.log

Suite Administration

Scenario Log file location
Fail to deploy a tenant
  • <global-volume>/logs/bo/<itom-bo-ats-deployment-pod>.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_tenantManagent.log
Fail to deploy DND capability
  • <global-volume>/logs/services/<yyyy.mm>/itom-dnd/deploy-controller/deploy-controller.log

Self Service Portal

Scenario Log file location

UI JS error
  • Browser har file and UI console
Backend error
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/<itom-xruntime-platform-pod>/maas/maas_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/serviceportal/<itom-xruntime-serviceportal-pod>/maas/ess_error.log

Service Management and platform services

The log files listed in this table are in the <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/${platform-pod}/maas folder, where ${platform-pod} can be an online or offline platform pod.

Scenario Log files
Common logs for issues with Service Management
  • maas_error.log
  • maas_unhandled_exceptions.log
PostgreSQL issues

Check the following parameters in postgresql.conf to find the log files:
log_directory = 'xxxx'
log_filename = 'xxxx'

If syslog_facility = 'xxx' and syslog_ident = 'xxxx' are configured, check /etc/rsyslog.conf to find the log file.
RabbitMQ issues <global-volume>/logs/xservices/rabbitmq/infra-rabbitmq-0/xxxxxxxxxxxxxx/
rabbit@infra-rabbitmq-<n>.saw-rabbitmq.<namespace>.svc.cluster.local..log
Dev2Prod issues

Online platform pods only:

  • maas_dev2prod.log
  • maas_packageManager.log
  • maas_workflow.log
  • maas_metadata_customization.log
  • maas_metadata.log, maas_metadata_error.log
  • maas_rms.log
  • maas_user_options_package_management.log
  • maas_filerepository_package_management.log
  • maas_ems_package_management.log
SLT issues

Offline platform pod only:

  • maas_slm.log
  • maas_search.log
  • maas_worker_audit.log
  • maas_worker.log
  • maas_rabbit_client.log
  • maas_messaging.log
Notification issues

Online and offline platform pods:

  • maas_notification.log
  • maas_mail.log
  • maas_ems_transaction_manager.log
  • maas_messaging.log
  • maas_rabbit_client.log
Workflow issues
  • maas_error.log
  • maas_unhandled_exceptions.log
  • maas_binder.log
  • maas_workflow.log
  • maas_workflow_mng.log
Taskplan issues
  • maas_error.log
  • maas_unhandled_exceptions.log
  • maas_binder.log
  • maas_tasks.log
  • maas_tasksGenerateExecutionPlanUpgrader.log
  • maas_tasksUpg.log
  • maas_tasksUpgrader.log
Record type issues
  • maas_ems.log
  • maas_ems_cache.log
  • maas_ems_package_management.log
  • maas_ems_transaction_manager.log
  • maas_ems_upgrade.log
  • maas_emsAudit.log
  • maas_ems_asynch_update.log
  • maas_ems_msp.log
Expense line is neither displayed nor working.
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_cost_allocation.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_unhandled_exceptions.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_unhandled_service_exceptions.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_cost_allocation.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_unhandled_exceptions.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_unhandled_service_exceptions.log
Audit Online and offline platform pods:
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_emsAudit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_rms_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_schedulerAudit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_slm_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_upg_step_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_worker_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_worker_master_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_worker_slave_audit.log
Data import & export     Online and offline platform pods:
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_data-export.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_metrics.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_scalable_import
Metrics     Online and offline platform pods:
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_metrics.log
Scheduler

Online and offline platform pods:

  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_schedulerAudit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_scheduler.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_user-work-schedule.log

Offline platform pod only:

  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_cloud_service_scheduler.log
Lookup service & system configuration     Online and offline platform pods:
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_lookup.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_unhandled_exceptions.log
Lifecycle driver Online and offline platform pods:
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_lifecycle.log
Report Online and offline platform pods
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_reports.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_worker.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_worker_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_worker_master_audit.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_worker_slave_audit.log
Tenant setting Online and offline platform pods:
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_tenantSettings.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_rms_cache.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_rms.log
Tomcat Online and offline platform pods:
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/catalina.out
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/localhost_access_log
OData
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/datahub/itom-xruntime-datahub-<xxx>/access_log.xxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/datahub/itom-xruntime-datahub-<xxx>/datahub.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/datahub/itom-xruntime-datahub-<xxx>/http.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/datahub/itom-xruntime-datahub-<xxx>/management_access_log.xxx.log

Startup Throttling Service

Scenario Log file location
A pod is stuck at status Init:N/N and the pod contains an init container named startup-throttling or dependency-resolver, or both. When you check the pod status with command kubectl describe pod <pod-name> -n <namespace>, the container status is NOT completed (State: Terminated and Reason: Completed). Run these commands to get the related logs:
  • kubectl logs -n <namespace> -c throttling-controller itom-throttling-controller-xxxx
  • kubectl logs -n <namespace> -c startup-throttling <pod-name>
  • kubectl logs -n <namespace> -c dependency-resolver <pod-name>

Smart Analytics Service

Scenario Log file location
Deploying or deleting a tenant fails in Suite Administration. The tenant's operation history in Suite Administration shows the operation of IDOL Driver timed out before the condition was fulfilled.
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/dih/<smarta-saw-dih-pod>-<yyyy.mm>/index.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/content/smarta-saw-con-0/index.log 
A full index is not completed for a long time and the index progress bar is always on in Service Management and Service Portal.
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_reindex.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-offline-xxx/maas/maas_reindex.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/smartanalytics/saw-proxy/smarta-saw-proxy-xxx/config-proxy.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/dih/smarta-saw-dih-xxx/index.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/content/smarta-saw-con-0/index.log
Search with keyword "***" can't return an expected result.
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/smartanalytics/saw-proxy/smarta-saw-proxy-xxx/config-proxy.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/smartanalytics/search/smarta-search-xxx/itom-sma-smarta-search.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/smartanalytics/search/smarta-search-xxx/access_log.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/smartanalytics/search/smarta-saw-proxy-xxx/config-proxy.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/dah/smarta-saw-dah-0/action.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/content/smarta-saw-con-0/query.log
Search is very slow.
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxx/maas/maas_search.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/smartanalytics/search/smarta-search-xxx/itom-sma-smarta-search.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/dah/smarta-saw-dah-0/action.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/content/smarta-saw-con-0/query.log
Search results can be displayed with a filter in Service Portal, but occasionally give no data without any filter.
  • <global-volume>/logs/smartanalytics/search/smarta-search-xxx/itom-sma-smarta-search.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/dah/smarta-saw-dah-0/action.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/content/smarta-saw-con-0/query.log
Not enough results are displayed on the Hot Topics Analysis page.
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/dah/smarta-saw-dah-0/action.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/saw/content/smarta-saw-con-0/query.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-offline-xxx/maas/offline maas_search.log
Smart Analytics not working as expected. 

You can use the following command to check if there's an image analysis issue. For example, upload a snapshot image but the OCR service does not work as expected:

kubectl logs smarta-ocr-xxx -n itsma-xxx  -c smarta-ocr
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/stx/mediaserver/smarta-stx-media-xxx/action.log
  • <smartanalytics-volume>/logs/idol/stx/mediaserver/smarta-stx-media-xxx/application.log

Service Management Chat Service

Scenario Log file location

The Ready status for sm-chat is not 4/4
  • Openfire logs:
    /var/vols/itom/itsma/global-volume/logs/openfire
  • Chatsvc logs:
    /var/vols/itom/itsma/global-volume/logs/chatsvc

Virtual Agent Service

Scenario Log file location
Virtual Agent does not work anymore. It gives no response on the UI.
  • <global-volume>/logs/va/runtime/virtual-agent-engine-web.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/va/runtime/common-error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/va/admin/virtual-agent-admin-web.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/va/admin/common-error.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/va/nlu/<virtual-agent-nlu-pod>.log

Software Asset Management Service (SAM)

Scenario Log file location

Fail to install SAM
  • <global-volume>/logs/sam/init/full.log
SAM compliance calculation fails
  • <global-volume>/logs/sam/backend/<TENANTID>/full.log

Cloud Management Platform (CMP) FinOps

Scenario Log file location
CMP FinOps  (Main Menu > Run > Cost Governance) services are not working properly
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/costpolicy/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-costpolicy.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/costpolicy/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
     
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/policy-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-policy-gateway.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/policy-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/showback/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-showback.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/showback/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/showback-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-showback-gateway.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/showback-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
Insights  (Main Menu > Run > Insights) services are not working properly
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/insights/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-insights.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/insights/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/insights-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-insights-gateway.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cgro/insights-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
CMP FinOps (Main Menu > Run > Cost Governance) collection fails
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/accounts/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-accounts.log, 
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/accounts/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/bootstrapjob/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/itom-cmp-bootstrap-job.log 
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/bootstrapjob/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/integration-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-integration-gateway.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/integration-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/scheduler/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-scheduler.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/scheduler/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
CMP FinOps provider (Main Menu > Administration > Utilities >  Providers > Cloud Cost Data Providers) configuration fails
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/accounts/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-accounts.log, 
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/accounts/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName_<appName>__<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/bootstrapjob/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/itom-cmp-bootstrap-job.log 
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/bootstrapjob/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/integration-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-integration-gateway.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/integration-gateway/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/scheduler/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>/hcm-scheduler.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/cmp/scheduler/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_<appName>_<workerName>_access_log/access_log.xxxx.log

Design and Deploy Service (DND)

Scenario Log file location
DND cloud subscription fails during deployment
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxxx/maas/maas_cloud_service.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-offline-xxxx/maas/maas_cloud_service.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-xxxx/maas/maas_cloud_service_scheduler.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/itom-xruntime-platform-offline-xxxx/maas/maas_cloud_service_scheduler.log
Communication failure between DND and Service Management
  • <global-volume>/logs/dnd/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_itom-dnd-controller_<workerName>/northstarapi/northstarapi.log

The log levels supported are INFO, DEBUG, TRACE, WARN, and ERROR.

By default Error messages will be written into the log files.

To change the log level for northstar api logs, follow the steps documented in Change log level - northstar api logs.
Communication failure between DND and UCMDB
  • <global-volume>/logs/dnd/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_itom-dnd-controller_<workerName>/ucmdb/ucmdb.log

The log levels supported are INFO, DEBUG, TRACE, WARN, and ERROR.

By default Error messages will be written into the log files.

To change the log level for ucmdb logs, follow the steps documented in Change log level - ucmdb logs.
DND services are not working



 
  • <global-volume>/logs/dnd/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_itom-dnd-controller_<workerName>/csa/csa.log
  • <global-volume>/logs/dnd/<namespace>/<namespace>_<podName>_itom-dnd-controller_<workerName>/catalina.log
